title: Is there any punishment on a woman's soul who has no one to wash, shroud or pray janazah for her?
transcript: mistre again says there's the body of the seized woman also get funeral crater on her is definitely a Muslim woman is like a Muslim man she must be washed shrouded and offered funeral prayer then she goes on saying if she has no relatives to wash her pray on her well the community is obliged to do this the women in the community must do this then she says if her body does not get washed prayed on does it affect her soul or body no it does not it does not because it is the sin none of the deceased but rather of the community as a whole as I've mentioned before
